title: _luxorum
description: Luxorum is a web application I developed to facilitate direct connections between customers and solar dealers, providing streamlined communication and personalized quote generation.

title: _inegrity
description: A budgeting web app with a dashboard, developed in under 14 hours with two partners for the 2024 Fall BYUI Hackathon, winning second place.

title: _cs-math-notes
